name: Cover letter
text:
Manjineshwaran 
    manjineshwaran@gmail.com 
    + 91 8300503218    
    Pondicherry     
    linkedin.com/in/manjineshwaran 
 
Dear Sir/madam, 
I am writing to express my keen interest in your organisation. With a strong passion for data-driven insights and a 
comprehensive skill set in machine learning, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my expertise to your 
esteemed organization. 
Innovative and scientifically rigorous professional with a significant data science knowledge bring to the table. I am eager 
to contribute to a dynamic organization. My diligence in all stages of the data science lifecycle, from data collection and 
preprocessing to model development, deployment, and interpretation of results. 
Highlights of my qualifications include: 
1. Strong Analytical Skills: Proficient in using statistical and machine learning techniques to derive meaningful insights 
from complex datasets. I have a proven track record of applying this knowledge to solve real-world problems and drive 
data-informed decision-making 
2. Advanced Machine Learning: A dept at implementing a wide array of machine learning algorithms, such as supervised 
and unsupervised learning, natural language processing, deep learning, and reinforcement learning. I am constantly 
exploring and adapting to the latest advancements in the field. 
3. Programming Proficiency: Skilled in Python, R, and SQL, enabling efficient data manipulation, analysis, and visualization. 
I am also experienced in utilizing libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn for model development. 
4. Big Data Technologies: Familiar with distributed computing frameworks in Hadoop and Spark, allowing me to handle 
and process large-scale datasets with ease 
I am genuinely enthusiastic about joining Organisation due to its reputation for innovation and excellence in the industry. I 
am confident that my skills and experience align perfectly with the requirements of the Data Scientist role. 
I look forward to discussing how my contributions can positively impact Organisation  data-driven initiatives and help drive 
its success. Thank you for considering my application. I have attached my resume for your review, and I am available at 
your convenience for an interview. 
Sincerely, 
Manjineshwaran

AI Engineer Consultant with end-to-end mastery in Computer Vision and NLP. I design, build, and deploy
intelligent systems that actually work in production—real-time video analytics (YOLO, DeepSort, OSNet),
player tracking, OCR pipelines, LLM agents, and custom NLP workflows.
AI Engineer Consultant, Zeeproc AI Technology.
Feb(2025) - Present
Designed and served high-performance FastAPI endpoints to
expose AI agents as microservices in a modular, scalable backend
architecture.
Built modular AI agents with LangChain + LangGraph for dynamic
tool routing, multi-step reasoning, and real-time customer
interactions.
Developed six core AI agents and a meta-agent orchestration layer
for coordinated decision-making.
Integrated LangMen for memory handling and multi-turn dialogue
continuity across agents.
Connected agents to a vector database for semantic search and
retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
Created MCP (Model Context Protocol) tool to fetch and unify data
from multiple remote servers.
Assisted in setting up CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to
automate code testing and Docker image builds for AI
microservices, helping streamline deployment workflows in the
development environment.
Exposed agents via scalable FastAPI endpoints, monitored using
LangSmith, and deployed with Docker & GCP.
Built deep learning models to predict churn, LTV, and upsell
opportunities using historical behavior data.
AI intern, Extazee software solutions
Nov(2024) - Jan(2024)
Preprocessed and augmented image datasets; trained YOLO Model
for defect detection (scratches, dents).
Built real-time OpenCV pipeline for factory feeds with automatic
pass/fail detection.
Added image augmentations like blur, brightness, and rotation to
improve model performance.
Built a real-time video pipeline using OpenCV to check factory
products automatically.
Integrated OCR with Tesseract to extract printed serial numbers
and labels for automated quality verification and traceability.
Deployed defect detection and OCR modules as RESTful
microservices using FastAPI, designed for real-time inference and
cloud integration.
